review: Rooms are nice and cozy. Service is  good  too  ,Staff are quick and efficient, polite . They arrange a bonfire every evening which you will really enjoy if you are in a group. Overall it was a memorable stay.and i will definitely visit again.
name: Madhu

review: Staff were very approachable and helpful.....rooms are nice , stay was comfortable and breakfast was excellent...location was perfect... As budget hotel, it was a wonderful experience. Good hospitality......
name: Nick
